author: jih2nn
content:
As we discussed in the first breakout, the PR to execution apis repo is now opened. Please take a look when you have time.

https://github.com/ethereum/execution-apis/pull/609

author: jih2nn
content: Also, here is another PR to geth: https://github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/pull/30914
